Keywords: Inhumans , Martial Artist
Real Name: Karnak Mander-Azur
Special Powers
IN EVERYTHING, A WEAKNESS: Close Combat Expert, Outwit. When Karnak has no action tokens and uses Outwit, adjacent opposing characters can't use Protected: Outwit or PROTECTED: Outwit until your next turn.

Goop
You really need a taxi with him if you want to use that super outwit. Overall for 40 pts he hits for 12/3 which is a little better than average. Not sure how well he will survive with only 17 Super Senses though.
January 3, 2021
HectorXV
Has some potential when used with Spider-Hamurai. His Outwit could help with putting some work in on pieces with the Power Cosmic/Quintessence TA's (i.e., Darkseid) or Juggernaut.
